label: accessory cost
description: Biomass investment [OMIT:0008566] in reproductive tissues [CARO:0000043] other than the seeds [PO:0009010]. These tissues include prepollination (flower, nectar, and pollen) and postpollination (packaging, protective and dispersal [EnvThes:21038] tissues) as well as aborted floral parts.

label: ambient photosynthetic rate
description: Photosynthetic rate [TO:0001015] in a plant whose photosystem [GO:0009521] I and II reaction centers [GO:0009538; GO:0009539] are exposed to ambient [NCIT:C62306] photosynthetically active radiation [ENVO:01001864] levels and ambient atmospheric carbon dioxide [ENVO:01000451] concentrations [PATO:0000033] while the measurement is made.

label: bark water content
description: A bark mass trait [APD:xxxxxxx] which is the mass [PATO:0000125] of water [CHEBI:15377] in a section of bark [PO:0004518].

label: coarse root
description: A root greater than 2 mm in diameter. The alternative to fine roots [EnvThes:20581].

label: ignition
description: The act of causing something to start burning [Merriam-Webster Dictionary]

label: fresh mass
description: The mass [PATO:0000125] of tissue [CARO_0000043] before it is dried; the mass of the tissue when it is fresh [EnvThes:21976].

label: leaf water content
description: A leaf mass trait [TO:0000505] which is the total mass [PATO:0000125] of water [CHEBI:15377] in a leaf [PO:0025034].

label: maximum photosynthetic rate, Amax
description: Photosynthetic rate [TO:0001015] in a plant whose photosystem [GO:0009521] I and II reaction centers [GO:0009538; GO:0009539] are saturated [NCIT_C61427] by photosynthetically active radiation [ENVO:01001864] and which is exposed to saturating atmospheric carbon dioxide [ENVO:01000451] concentrations [PATO:0000033] while the measurement is made..

label: merism
description: The repetition of similar parts, units, or segments within the structure of an organism. [www.lexico.com]

label: non-structural carbohydrates
description: Carbohydrates [CHEBI:16646], including starches [CHEBI:28017] and sugars [APD:xxxxxxx], that are relatively easy to metabolise [NCIT:C19536] by both plants and animals.

label: pendulous
description: Hanging downward loosely or freely. [Simpson]

label: per unit mass
description: A ratio [PATO:0001470], where the denominator [NCIT:C80489] is a measure of mass [PATO:0000125].

label: placentation
description: Referring to the position [PATO:0000140] of the ovules [PO:0020003] within the ovary [PO:0009072]. [Plant Systematics]

label: whole plant leaf dry mass
description: A leaf mass trait [TO:0000505] which is the sum of the leaf dry mass [TO:0000505] of all leaves [PO:0025034] of a whole plant [PO:0000003] [from TOP].

label: whole plant stem dry mass
description: A stem mass trait [TO:0000952] which is the sum of the stem dry mass [TO:0003001] of all leaves [PO:0009047] of a whole plant [PO:0000003] [dervied from TOP].

label: whole plant dry mass
description: The dry mass [PATO:0000125] of a whole plant [PO:0000003].

label: pollinator
description: A pollinator is an animal that intentionally or unintentionally moves pollen from the male anther of a flower to the female stigma of a flower. [Wikipedia]

label: punch
description: The force [PATO:0001035] required to punch a hole.

label: saturated photosynthetic rate, Asat
description: Photosynthetic rate [TO:0001015] in a plant whose photosystem [GO:0009521] I and II reaction centers [GO:0009538; GO:0009539] are saturated [NCIT_C61427] by photosynthetically active radiation [ENVO:01001864] and which is exposed to ambient [NCIT:C62306] atmospheric carbon dioxide [ENVO:01000451] concentrations [PATO:0000033] while the measurement is made.

label: smoulder combustion
description: The slow, flameless form of combustion, sustained by the heat evolved when oxygen directly attacks the surface of a condensed-phase fuel. [Wikipedia]

label: sugar
description: An informal grouping of carbohydrates [CHEBI:16646] that includes monosaccharides [CHEBI:35381] and disaccharides [CHEBI:36233].

label: vessel lumen
description: The lumen [PO:0025117] of the xylem vessel [PO:0025417].

label: vestiture
description: Trichome cover [TO:0006066], a combination of trichome type [TO:0000911], length [PATO:0000122], strength [PATO:0001230], shape [PATO:0000052], density [PATO:0001019], and color [PATO:0000014] [Simpson glossary]

label: pressure-volume curve
description: A plot of the relationship between tissue water content and tissue water potential, which is used in plant water-relations studies to understand tissue/cell elasticity, cell turgor, and cell osmotic potential.
